means: 有预知能力的，有先见之明的

sentence.Network_en: It was a remarkably prescient vision.
Regrettably for Australia, that report appears remarkably prescient.
sentence.Network_cn: 不幸的是, 该报告的预测惊人地准确.

sentence.Network_en: This was his second prescient call.

46. 遭受重创 take a heavy toll47. 先见之明 prescient move48. 奇园古宅 exotic gardens and old s

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent.: from Latin praescient- 'knowing beforehand', from the verb praescire, from prae 'before' + scire 'know'

entry.tran: 预知的；预见性的；能预见未来的
entry.def: If you say that someone or something was prescient, you mean that they were able to know or predict what was going to happen in the future.

example.ex: ...'Bob Roberts', an eerily prescient comedy about a populist multimillionaire political candidate.
example.tran: 《天生赢家》，一部关于一位拥有数千万家财的平民党政治候选人的怪诞预言性喜剧

means.word_mean: 1. perceiving the significance of events before they occur;

sentences.sentence: "extroardinarily prescient memoranda on the probable course of postwar relations"-R.H.Rovere

auth_sentence.content: Her coverage was relentless, scathing, and prescient.
auth_sentence.res_content: Her coverage was relentless, scathing, and prescient.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Her coverage was relentless, scathing, and prescient.

auth_sentence.content: Kafka...an amazingly prescient political writer who had foreseen...totalitarianism.
auth_sentence.res_content: Kafka...an amazingly prescient political writer who had foreseen...totalitarianism.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Kafka...an amazingly prescient political writer who had foreseen...totalitarianism.

auth_sentence.content: Mr. Forbes has been prescient about tastes before.
auth_sentence.res_content: Mr. Forbes has been prescient about tastes before.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Mr. Forbes has been prescient about tastes before.

stems_affixes.word_buile: pre在……前的,预先+built建造的,build的过去式和过去分词→adj.预制的
pre在……前的,预先+car=care关心+ious……的→要预先关心的→冒险的
pre在……前的,预先+cise切→预先切好的→精确的
pre在……前的,预先+coc=coct煮+ious……的→提前煮熟→早熟的
pre在……前的,预先+school学校→上学前的
pre在……前的,预先+sci知道+ent表形容词→预先知道
pre在……前的,预先+amble跑→跑在前面→前言
pre在……前的,预先+caution小心→预先小心→预防
pre在……前的,预先+ced走+ent人或物等→走在前面的东西→先例
pre在……前的,预先+cept拿→以前拿好的[名言]→格言
pre在……前的,预先+cinct捆→预先捆好的→范围
pre在……前的,预先+cipice头→在前面是尽头→峭壁
pre在……前的,预先+cipit头→ation→落在前头→降落,下降
pre在……前的,预先+destination目的地→预先定好的目的地→命中注定
pre在……前的,预先+disposition性情→性情预定→癖性
pre在……前的,预先+fix固定→固定在前面→前缀
pre在……前的,预先+history历史→n.史前
pre在……前的,预先+occup占有+ation表名词→优先占有[注意力]→全神贯注
pre在……前的,预先+position位置→位置放在前面→前置词
pre在……前的,预先+rog要求+ative表名词→预先要求→[有]特权
pre在……前的,预先+ced走+e→走在前面→[时间上]先于
pre在……前的,预先+clud关闭+e→提前关闭→阻止
pre在……前的,预先+dict说→预先说→预言
pre在……前的,预先+fer带来→先带来→更喜欢
pre在……前的,预先+pay付钱→v.预付

stems_affixes.value_cn: 审慎正直的,认真的,本着良心的
stems_affixes.word_buile: con全部+sci知道+entious多……的→知道关心的多→有责任,认真的

stems_affixes.value_cn: [of]意识到的,自觉的;神志清醒的
stems_affixes.word_buile: con全部+sci知道+ous……的→意识到的
ne不+scient[adj.有知识的, 有技巧的]→adj.无知的;没有知识的
omni到处+scient知道的→adj.无所示在的
pre预先+sci知道+ent……的→预先知道的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 有知识的, 有技巧的
stems_affixes.word_buile: sci知道+ent……的→adj.有知识的, 有技巧的
sci知道+ent+ific表形容词→adj.科学上的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 不省人事, 未发觉的, 无意识的
stems_affixes.word_buile: un不+conscious意识到的→adj.不省人事, 未发觉的, 无意识的
sub下面+conscious意识到的→在意识之下→潜意识的
con全部+sci知道+ence表名词→全部知道→良知,良心
pre预先+sci知道+ence表名词→预先知道
pseudo假+science科学→n.伪科学
sci知道+ence表名词→n.科学;学科
scient[adj.有知识的, 有技巧的]+ist专家或人→n.科学家
